duties_responsibilities.duty: Negotiate and procure a broad spectrum of goods or services for the company under limited supervision.
Lead complex negotiations with key suppliers and communicate clearly with internal stakeholders.
Track and monitor category for impact on pricing & supply, and secure desired quantities at lowest feasible costs meeting quality specifications.
Deliver category rate and risk assessment and associated communication for assigned materials to appropriate stakeholders.
Actively lead supplier quality for goods or services and resolve quality, cost, and delivery issues with key customers.
Monitor and track supplier performance, cost savings, and continuous improvement, and develop solutions to address issues.
Create the category supplier strategy in concert with the Director.
Drive results in Price, Rate, and Risk Management, Project Execution, Raw Material Quality, Supplier Service, and Supplier Product Innovation.
